title: Add ticks-alert component
description:
Alert/notification box component with variants: success (green), error (red), warning (yellow), info (blue).

Features:
- Colored left border or background tint based on variant
- Optional icon slot
- Optional close button
- Matches existing badge color palette

Usage:
<ticks-alert variant="error">Invalid email or password</ticks-alert>
<ticks-alert variant="success" closable>Account created!</ticks-alert>
acceptance_criteria: Component renders correctly in preview page with all variants
